text: Brush Creek is a tributary of Connoquenessing Creek in western Pennsylvania. The stream rises in northwestern Allegheny County and flows northwest, entering Connoquenessing Creek at Hazen. The watershed is roughly 35% agricultural, 42% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Beaver River Category:Rivers of Beaver County, Pennsylvania Category:Rivers of Butler County, Pennsylvania Category:Rivers of Allegheny County, Pennsylvania
title: Brush Creek (Connoquenessing Creek tributary)
